item.title: Agility with devolution 7.0 help
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

I know where to put these code to client.java but where exactly? I tried a lot of time to place this code to client.java and i got 100 errors.

//start of Maximums agility
case 2295:
if (absX == 2474 && absY == 3436) {
walkTo(2474, 3429);
addSkillXP(185, 16);
actionTimer = 10;
break;
}
}
case 2285:
if (absX == 2474 && absY == 3426) {
teleportToX = 2474;
teleportToY = 3424;
heightLevel = 1;
addSkillXP(185, 16);
actionTimer = 10;
break;
}
}
case 2313:
if (absX == 2473 && absY == 3423) {
teleportToX = 2473;
teleportToY = 3420;
heightLevel = 2;
addSkillXP(185, 16);
actionTimer = 10;
break;
}
}
case 2312:
if (absX == 2477 && absY == 3420) {
walkTo(2483, 3420);
addSkillXP(185, 16);
actionTimer = 10;
break;
}
}
case 2314:
if (absX == 2485 && absY == 3419) {
teleportToX = 2485;
teleportToY = 3421;
heightLevel = 0;
addSkillXP(185, 16);
actionTimer = 10;
break;
}
}
case 2286:
if (absX == 2485 && absY == 3425) {
teleportToX = 2485;
teleportToY = 3427;
heightLevel = 0;
addSkillXP(185, 16);
actionTimer = 10;
break;
}
}
case 154:
if (absX == 2484 && absY == 3430) {
walkTo(2484, 3437);
addSkillXP(185, 16);
actionTimer = 10;
break;
}
}
case 4058:
if (absX == 2487 && absY == 3430) {
walkTo(2487, 3437);
addSkillXP(185, 16);
actionTimer = 10;
break;
}
}
//end of Maximums agility

Thanks.
